availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Woodruff. Father of William M. Woodruff, Thirza Woodruff, Jane Woodruff, Benjamin Woodruff, Mahala Ellen Woodruff, Robert Woodruff, Ambrose G. Woodruff, Nancy Woodruff, John Woodruff, Parthana "Thana" Woodruff, Preston Woodruff, and Henry Woodruff. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 55B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 740.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Charleston, p. 103A-B.
